*Wrath and Kamodia begin walking around looking at all the CR Chamber's and=
 Computer's* Kamodia: Well, I seem to like it. Wrath: It didn't take us too=
 long to get in here. *They both turned to Dracona* Kamodia: I wish to join=
. Wrath: Count me in for that.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THEC=
ODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 5:30 PM
  Subj=
ect: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  "yes, you can join us, the People's Group!..." =
Dracona said..... "come on, we'll show you, but promise not to ever let thi=
s slip out......" Dracona said.....Dracona put a blindfold on Wrath and Kam=
odia and (with Orchid's permission only, if Orchid doesn't like this then i=
t doesn't have to happen, just wanted to quicken things...) took them throu=
gh the secret passageway..... "thiss is the base....it's all underground...=
." Dracona said, removing the blindfolds from Wrath and Kamodia.....
    --=
--- Original Message ----- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egrou=
ps.com 
    Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 3:36 AM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast =
Wars


    *Wrath and Kamodia turned to look* Wrath: Do you know where we c=
an get a job? *Wrath asked to Dracona* *Wrath said as he and Kamodia walked=
 up to Dracona* *Kamodia smiled as she got her wish of meeting some more bo=
ts*
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwr=
pg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 3:24 AM
      Subject: Re=
: Neo Beast Wars


      Dracona and company finishe repairing all except f=
or suukie, wgo was injured too bad and would take a long time to repair..Pl=
intissa, much to Dracona's anger, had forgotten about their mission and sta=
yed to talk to Suukie....the Radicons and Dracona came from the secret pass=
age way when nobody could possibly see, and walked off searching for some m=
embers......the Radicons bickered among themselves and Dracona studied the =
landscape..Dracona saw Wrath and Kamodia.. "hey, you 2, over here!..." Drac=
ona said, calling out Wrath and Kamodia......the Radicons drew their blaste=
rs and stood guard, Scamrock laughed and played with his thumbs......Dracon=
a showed her hands empty to show that she came in peace....she waved to Wra=
th and Kamodia.....
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: ilo=
vealllizards 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Monday, May 29,=
 2000 9:12 PM
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


        *Kamodia though=
t she saw something for a minute but figures its all in her mond continues =
walking on*
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: THECODE=
 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Monday, May 29, 2000 6:=
43 AM
          Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          Plintissa looks in =
the distance and spots Wrath and Kamodia....Plintissa knows the would be go=
od for the People's Group, but no wway she could invite them with these idi=
ot Truths surrounding her!......she ushers to Wrath and Kamodia, hoping the=
y'll see......
            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: =
ilovealllizards 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Mond=
ay, May 29, 2000 2:15 AM
            Subject: Neo Beast Wars


            =
*Wrath and Kamodia still stand on the outside of the Maximal base* Wrath: H=
EEEEYYYY!! WE WANT A JOB!!! *Wrath yells at the top of his lungs* *Than he =
notices Kamodia walking away* Wrath: Where are you going? Kamodia: I'm not =
sticking around here when they don't want us. Wrath: How do you know that t=
hey don't? Kamodia: If they really wanted us than they'd answer us. *Kamodi=
a turns and walks on looking for another base* *Wrath stands there thinking=
 about what Komodia said and comes to the fact that she's right* Wrath: Hey=
 wait up! *Wrath comes running up and catches up with Kamodia* Kamodia: Wha=
t made you leave? *She says giving off a sly grin* Wrath: I came to the fac=
t that I'm too good for that dump. Kamodia: Come on, admit it! I'm right. I=
f they really wanted us then they would've answered us. *Wrath doesn't answ=
er and keeps looking foward* Kamodia: Your just mad because you know I'm ri=
ght but you are right about that place being a dump. *They contiue walking =
on*
